A few details are surprisingly deceptive: when sneaking and moving into some kind of high bushes, those remain static... I find it a bit shocking in 2020 (exemple at 22m40s...even AC black flag in 2013 was far better on that). Although some others bushes do move when passing through, the way those are modelized and moving is so bad (exemple with red flowers at 26m55s). I just got the SeriesX version so I noticed it while playing. Regarding the HUD, you can lessen text size and desactivate it, but there's no in-between (can't manage opacity, or let appear the objective just by tapping a button for instance...) And I find the life bar is too significant visually and the compass indication too long... It hurts immersion.

Here is a funny thing, the guy who killed Eivor father is named Kjotve, in Norwegian  it is two words put together which is''Kj√∏tt'' and ''Ved''. hence it becomes Kj√∏ttved, and thereafter Kjotve.
